news.title: 欧洲慌了！特朗普新秩序已定
特朗普计划访问委内瑞拉，但石油计划障碍重重
news.title0: Trump eyes Venezuela visit – but obstacles to his oil plan remain
news.content: 美国总统特朗普计划访问委内瑞拉，意图开发其世界最大石油储备，但该国能源基础设施破败，投资风险巨大。
news.content0: After US President Donald Trump oversaw the seizure of his Venezuelan counterpart Nicolás Maduro last month, he vowed to tap the country's oil reserves – the world's largest.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 新证据显示英国警方曾构陷男子谋杀罪
news.title0: Police framed man for murder, new evidence suggests
news.content: BBC调查发现，一名因谋杀罪入狱23年的男子可能被警方构陷，关键证人证词与监控录像矛盾，多名证人称遭警方胁迫作伪证。
news.content0: New evidence in the case of a man who has spent 23 years in prison for murder suggests he was framed by police, BBC Panorama has found.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 以色列女兵遭极端正统派男子追赶，警方介入解救
news.title0: Female Israeli soldiers rescued after being chased by ultra-Orthodox men
news.content: 两名以色列女兵被误认为递送征兵令，遭极端正统派犹太男子群体追赶，警方使用震爆弹驱散人群并逮捕23人。
news.content0: Two female Israeli soldiers had to be rescued by police after being chased by a crowd of ultra-Orthodox Jewish men.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 悉尼八旬老人被误绑架，警方紧急寻人
news.title0: Sydney police plead for return of man, 85, kidnapped by mistake
news.content: 悉尼一名85岁独居老人被至少三名袭击者从家中绑走，警方认为这是一起误绑案，呼吁绑匪放人。
news.content0: Sydney police have appealed for the return of an 85-year-old whom they believe was kidnapped by mistake.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 《美食、祈祷、恋爱》出版20周年，如何征服全球读者
news.title0: Eat, Pray, Love – go! How Elizabeth Gilbert and her readers conquered the world
news.content: 伊丽莎白·吉尔伯特的回忆录《美食、祈祷、恋爱》出版20周年，该书从个人游记演变为全球现象，激励无数读者踏上自我发现之旅。
news.content0: It was when she got to San Diego, of all places, that Elizabeth Gilbert realized everything had changed. She had left home as the author of a reasonably successful, year-old memoir titled “Eat, Pray, Love,” a first-person fusion of travelogue, confessional, and self-help manual, tracing her post-divorce journeys to Italy, India and Indonesia. On tour to promote the book’s paperback release, Gilbert recalls, she’d been speaking to audiences of “10, 15, 20 people.”
news.author: CNN

news.title: 为何滑雪永远是“最时髦”的运动
news.title0: Why skiing will forever be the most glamorous sport
news.content: 滑雪运动一个多世纪以来不仅是交通或体育，更是一种时髦的生活方式，其魅力在于下山的快感与滑雪后的社交乐趣。
news.content0: For over a century, skiing has been more than transportation or sport. It’s been a lifestyle, emphasis on the second syllable.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 泰勒·雷迪克为乔丹旗下车队赢得戴通纳500大赛
news.title0: Tyler Reddick wins the Daytona 500 for Michael Jordan-owned 23XI Racing
news.content: 车手泰勒·雷迪克在最后时刻超越对手，为迈克尔·乔丹与丹尼·哈姆林共同拥有的23XI Racing车队赢得戴通纳500大赛冠军。
news.content0: Tyler Reddick won theDaytona 500in a car owned byMichael Jordanwhen Chase Elliott crashed as he and Reddick were battling for the win.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 加拿大枪支回购计划遇阻，控枪虽受欢迎但执行困难
news.title0: Gun control is popular in Canada. So why is a major buyback program attracting criticism?
news.content: 加拿大开始实施针对攻击性武器的全国性回购计划，但该计划因实际和后勤问题面临延误，并遭到警方、省级官员和枪主反对。
news.content0: Thedeadly mass shootingat a school in British Columbia came as Canadian authorities face significant obstacles in rolling out a nationwide firearms buyback that is mired in practical and logistical complications.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 奥运奖牌归宿令人意外：许多冠军将其藏在袜子里
news.title0: You’d Be Surprised to See Where Many Olympians Keep Their Medals
news.content: 许多奥运冠军并未将来之不易的奖牌展示于众，而是选择将其存放在袜子抽屉等不起眼的地方，认为放在保险箱里“很荒谬”。
news.content0: Olympic medals are among the most coveted prizes in sports. Athletes can spend decades in their pursuit, and only the greatest in the world succeed.
news.author: NYTimes
